mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This receipt is on paper with a letterhead for Adams & Lockridge, Real Estate Agents, Buena Vista, Va. The names of Hugh Adams (presumably Adams, Jr.) and H. M. Lockridge appear at the top of the page. The receipt indicates that Adams and Lockridge received five hundred dollars from R. S. Hutcheson to be invested for him in the Pocahontas & Greenbrier Investment Co. The reverse states, "By cash on the within July 4th 1891 of Adams & Lockridge sixteen dollars."
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Receipt from Adams & Lockridge to R. S. Hutcheson, December 4, 1890
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
